user_query: I'm planning a family trip to Japan and I want to explore the local culture. Can you provide me with the latest commodities news from Japan? Additionally, I would like to know the current market indicators for cryptocurrencies. Finally, please recommend some traditional Japanese dishes to try.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the latest commodities news related to Japan.
Fetch the current market indicators for cryptocurrencies.
Get recommendations for traditional Japanese dishes to try during the trip.
